title: # 476 - Sebastian Maniscalco & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian Sebastian Maniscalco. We talk about raising kids, Sebastian’s childhood, selling satellites at the mall, weight lifting, partying with Snoop, and much more! 

 

Go to http://www.sebastianlive.com for all of Sebastians tour dates! 

 

This episode is brought to you by Ladder. Go to http://www.ladderlife.com/bert to find out if you’re approved today! 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Better Help. Get 20% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert  

 

This episode is also brought to you by 3CHi. Go to http://www.3chi.com and use the code “BERT” at checkout for 5% off your order.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Birddogs. Enter promo code “BERT” and get a free Whistle Tip Football at http://www.birddogs.com  

 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer
